demo_description: Register a PicoScratch demo version to try PicoScratch for free at your school
demo_schoolname: What is the name of your school?
demo_error: An error occurred. Please try again later.
demo_welcome_subtext: Your school code is {code}. Please make a note of this, as you will need it to log in.
demo_welcome_subtext_2: The password you provided is for the "admin" user. You can create additional users in the administration area.
select_something: Select an Option on the left side
teacher_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete teacher {teacher}?
room_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete room {room}?
course_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete course {course}?
delete_user_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete user {user}?
delete_user_confirm_subtext: The user will be removed from the leaderboard and will have to redo all tasks. This action cannot be undone!
no_students_subtext: Download PicoScratch Learn on your computers, connect to this school, and start learning!
